snippet: Mattel has joined with Chillingo, a division of Electronic Arts, to offer an action game for iOS devices that honors the 30th anniversary of He-Man and the Masters of the Universe.
abstract: Mattel has joined with Chillingo, a division of Electronic Arts, to offer an action game for iOS devices that honors the 30th anniversary of He-Man and the Masters of the Universe.

headline.main: He-Man Celebrates 30 Years by Showing Off His Swordplay (and His Abs)
headline.print_headline: He-Man at 30, Showing Off His Swordplay (and His Abs)
